snippet: Regulatory filings released by the Food and Drug Administration added Rockstar Energy to the group of products possibly involved in health problems.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration releases records about fatality and injury filings that mention the possible involvement of highly caffeinated products Rockstar Energy, 5-Hour Energy and Monster Energy; report could indicate a shift towards stiffer oversight of dietary supplements by the agency.
lead_paragraph: Regulatory filings released by the Food and Drug Administration added Rockstar Energy to the group of products possibly involved in health problems.

headline.main: F.D.A. Posts Injury Data for 3 Drinks
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Posts Injury Data For 3 Drinks
